title: mystery with int array instance variable s1

content.description: The question refer to the following data field and method.
content.question: private int[] arr; // precondition: arr.length > 0 public void mystery() { int sl = 0; int s2 = 0; for (int k = 0; k < arr.length; k++) { int num = arr[k]; if ((num > 0) && (num % 2 == 0)) sl += num; else if (num < 0) s2 += num; } System.out.println(s1); System.out.println(s2); } Which of the following best describes the value of s1 output by the method mystery ?

choices.label: The sum of all positive values in arr
The sum of all positive even values in arr
The sum of all positive odd values in arr
The sum of all values greater than 2 in arr

content.answer: The sum of all positive even values in arr

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
